line_2: The Man within the Coach that sits,
She'll have her will, or have her fits;

line_1: Scorns poor Defect, and to no Fault submits;
line_2: There ev'ry Charm in lofty Triumph sits,

line_1: He that in Blind Dependence now submits,
line_2: Will rouse his Strength, when he shall rouse his Wits;
